front.title: Derivation, delivery and management of EAP based keys for handover and re-authentication

abstract.t: This document describes a delivery framework for usage and domain specific root keys (USRK and DSRK), derived as part of an EAP EMSK hierarchy, and delivered from an EAP server to an intended third party key holder. The framework description includes different scenarios for key delivery, depending on the type of keys being delivered. It also includes, specification of derivation of keys required for security protection of key requests and delivery signaling.
